Generic.error: Oops! Something went wrong. Please try again later.

Unauthenticated.error: You are unauthenticated, please log in and try again.

Forbidden.error: You are not authorized to do that.

NotFound.error: That resource was not found. Please try again.

DuplicateName.error: Something already exists with that name. Please try again with a different name.

DuplicateUser.error: A user already exists with that email. Try logging in or resetting your password.

SessionExpired.error: Your session has expired, please log in again.

BadToken.error: Something is wrong with your JWT. Please check it and try again.
